name: LaunchVerse
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

The following token has a variable tax function on the smart contract to change tax rates post deployment.
Do your own research and be careful if you are trading this token.

description.en:
LaunchVerse is a Data Aggregator and crypto IDO platform focussing on upcoming projects in the market and other Launchpads’ performances over the IDOs launched on their platforms. It is Powered by XLV which provides unique earning ways and services to holders.

XLV is the first cryptocurrency which reflects IDO tokens from other Launchpads, NFTs and XLV to holders as redistribution. In addition to LaunchVerse having its own Launchpad it also is a crypto platform providing other Launchpads' statistics, upcoming IDOs and events for user comparison.
